summary: As the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria emerged, it seized territory in Iraq and Syria, and established branches and launched terror attacks in a number of countries. The U.S. government, working with international partners, undertakes a range of efforts to counter the group. We identified 9 key issues related to U.S. counter-ISIS efforts. Among the issues: Assisting and equipping Iraqi and Syrian opposition forces...
title: Countering ISIS and Its Effects: Key Issues for Oversight
